name: BRANDiD Developers
tagline: This is how we build getbrandid.com
body:
![getbrandid.com](http://brandid.s3.amazonaws.com/logo.png)

# About Us
At [BRANDiD](https://www.getbrandid.com) we love to build on the bleeding edge. This is where you'll find some of our coolest projects.

by Nicolas Kermarc (@spacenick) and Arush Sehgal (@arush)

### Boilerplate for Parse x AngularJS x Backbone.js
We presented this to both the AngularJS and Parse teams and they love it. Clone this repo to get a database enabled AngularJS app working in seconds. It also uses 4 best practices we've developed for building serverless apps. Check out the docs for more info.

[Live Demo & Docs](http://brandid.github.io/parse-angular-demo)

### Backbone Baguette
Backbone on steroids. Write dramatically less code, enjoy your app more. Baguette is only 1.4Kb. Written by @spacenick

[baguette.io](http://baguette.io)

### Shop via Command Line
Video of our #seedhack hackathon project presentation at Google Campus in London, including an excellent impression of Johnny Ive.

Video link [here](http://vimeo.com/59566605)

![BRANDiD Seedhack project](http://b.vimeocdn.com/ts/414/036/414036970_640.jpg)


### Generate RecurlyJS Signatures in Node
Node.js module for generating signatures for your sexy Recurly.js forms

[Recurly](http://www.recurly.com) has a great API for payments, but doesn't have an easy way to generate signatures if you're on nodejs. So we built it for you - 

[node-recurlyjs-sign](https://github.com/brandid/node-recurlyjs-sign)


### Want to work with us?
Find us on [AngelList](http://angel.co/brandid)
